page.title: 14A Day In My Life
page.content: {An account written by Kathryn Phelps {of Tyr Graig School. Today is Wednesday 1st of May.My mum woke me at 7.25am.I got up dressed, brushed my hair and ran down stairs for breakfast.After I ran upstairs to brush my teeth and wash my hands and face.Then as I was going swimming with the school today,I got my towel and swimming costume ready.My school is Tyr Graig School.My mum takes my sister and me to school in the car. When I reached school I gave my teacher my swimming money and then went to buy my tuck.After registration those of us going swimming had to line up at the door.When the bus arrived we filed on.It takes us 10 minutes to reach the swimming bath at Abertillery Today we are practising for the Inter-school Gala and there is alot of excitement.
